dependencies.name: NIS2 - Authentication Activity
dependencies.filter: (general_information.common_event_name = authentication failure OR general_information.common_event_name = authentication success) and general_information.log_source.type_name != LogRhythm SIEM Debug
dependencies.layout: {"search":{"LRSearchRequest":{"filter":"(general_information.common_event_name = authentication failure OR general_information.common_event_name = authentication success) and general_information.log_source.type_name != LogRhythm SIEM Debug","aggregations":{"aggregationRequests":[{"aggregationType":"COUNT_TREND","bucketInterval":"1h","bucketLimit":24,"bucketOrder":"TOP","field":"general_information.standard_message_time"}]},"pageRequest":{"limit":100},"dateTime":"now-24h","time":{"field":"general_information.standard_message_time","lrDateTime":"now-24h"}}},"config":{"timeRangeId":"last24hours","timeRangeName":"Last 24 hours","autoRefresh":false},"grid":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":0,"h":0,"minW":0,"minH":0,"moved":false,"static":true},"columns":["general_information.standard_message_time","general_information.raw_message","general_information.common_event_name","unattributed.account.email_address","unattributed.host.ip_address.value","origin.host.ip_address.ipv4","general_information.log_source.name","general_information.log_source.type_name","origin.account.name","target.host.name"],"sortingPreference":[{"direction":"desc","columnName":"general_information.standard_message_time"}]}
